reviewText: Considering the fact that most transportation videos comprise train, streetcars, automobiles, military vehicles, and even John Deere tractors, there is very little on the subject of what is probably the most underated and ultilitaran piece of rolling stock, the bus.  Although it could had been more detailed, the program was for the most part well done and thought out.  Still there was something missing.  However for the bus fan and those who never thought of the bus as something worthy other then the thing used to go to work, school, or the other outing, this story maybe worth understanding.
